Nice i like the price
when does the vault open

Big vault opens with all or most legacy skins released are pretty rare. Done it twice in two years I think!
But we usually offer seasonal legacy content every year around their event (Snowdown, Harrowing, Lunar Revel).

Maybe we'll do another big vault open this year, not sure. Keep any eye out for any announcements!
Thanks :3

Just a question, when will championship kalista be availible?
{{champion:429}}
When are the early sales? because I really want demon {{champion:254}} but it hasn't come for me. have I missed it??
what is  early sale? i never saw the project lucian{{champion:236}}  on store!

Early sales are for new skins (released last 6 months) to go on sale before they normally would under the regular sales schedule. See [here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/were-changing-discounts) for details.
For the early sales, would they be mixed with the actual sales. Just wanna know. Like is the early sales ( all champion skins) gonna be up the same time or not? Its really important if i know this
All the items on this list are scheduled to go on sale some time in March. Early Sales are separate to regular sales and will go up alongside a regular sale.
Might be a stupid question, but what does 'Early Sales' mean?  I really want the Void Bringer {{champion:420}} skin.

Early Sale means that those skins are going on sale earlier than the previous scheduled sales would have them. See the [change to sale schedules](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/were-changing-discounts) here for details
what happens to the people who bought a skin that is on this list like just before this schedule was posted?
i think if it was 2 weeks before or a month, you can get half of it refunded but you need to send a support ticket
what's a support ticket?? soz i dont know XD
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us and in the top right corner, click 'submit a request' and it'll take you through things
